feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student clearly built a functioning financial tool that analyzes capital budgeting (NPV/IRR), implements it via an AI agent, and demonstrates multiple example outputs including approvals, rejections, and suspicious-data flags. Implementation and reflection evidence show the tool performs financial tasks and includes necessary guardrails, meeting PASS standards.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates concrete AI integration (API use, structured outputs, sanity checks) and shows iterative improvement to address failures (gullibility → guardrails), plus explained how AI adds conversational value beyond calculation. These specifics across Discover, Implement, and Reflect meet the threshold for a thorough, effective AI integration.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "what I decided to build is basically a CFO bot."
"we go to the AI agent with the Google Gemini chat API and it will parse it."
"the implied internal rate of return would be about 675% which is too good to be true and it's extraordinarily high. So we have suspicious data"
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover (identified goal: CFO bot to analyze capital budgeting), Implement (described execution and use of Google Gemini API to parse inputs and produce structured outputs), Reflect (discussed guardrails/sanity checks and learned from iterations).
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly built a functioning financial tool that analyzes capital budgeting (NPV/IRR), implements it via an AI agent, and demonstrates multiple example outputs including approvals, rejections, and suspicious-data flags. Implementation and reflection evidence show the tool performs financial tasks and includes necessary guardrails, meeting PASS standards.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "so we go to the AI agent with the Google Gemini chat API and it will parse it."
"my first version was a simple chat box that worked but it was gullible"
"Instead of just being like a calculator and telling you this is a net present value, the AI turns it into more of a conversation. So it explains the reasoning of why."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: defined the problem and goal ("CFO bot" to "analyze capital budgeting proposals"); Implement: used Google Gemini API, structured output, and iterated from a gullible chat box to prompt-engineered guardrails; Reflect: discussed lessons and guardrails needed to make AI outputs reliable.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates concrete AI integration (API use, structured outputs, sanity checks) and shows iterative improvement to address failures (gullibility → guardrails), plus explained how AI adds conversational value beyond calculation. These specifics across Discover, Implement, and Reflect meet the threshold for a thorough, effective AI integration.
